name: The Forest of Evil
overview: Published by the Guild Adventure Software and Your Commodore 1985/02, a text adventure. Many months ago your lifelong friend, Albert, set out to rescue the Prince of Cenra who has been captured by the evil witch and is reputed to have been turned into a poor little frog. Albert has never returned and you must set out to find him and in the process you must also find four items of treasure which were stolen from your land by the evil witch.
